Very Short (1 Sentence).message: Please keep your answer to a single sentence. Less than 20 words preferred.

Short (2-3 sentences).message: Please keep your answer to 2-3 sentences.

Medium (1 paragraph).message: Please keep your answer to a single paragraph (4-5 sentences).

Long (2-3 paragraphs).message: Please keep your answer to 2-3 paragraphs.

Very Long (4+ paragraphs).message: Please keep your answer to 4+ paragraphs.

Unlimited.message: Feel free to write as much as you like.
